subject: testing   an  ejb
msgSnippet: The web  application runs in jboss . I have a plain class and from there and from there various   entity beans called, to interact with database Inorder to
messageBody:
The web application runs in jboss .

I have a plain class and from there and from there various entity
beans called, to interact with database

Inorder to test I am using junit

now my doubt is
1) can this task ( testing ejb) can be accomplished by junit
2) any other packages are needed for the deployment other than junit.
3) where should the test files be placed ( inside the jboss or
outside the application)


Thank You,
snigdha
